definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
Heaven will not disappoint the person who tries (idiom). If you try hard, you're bound to succeed eventually.
pinyin: Huang2 tian1 bu4 fu4 ku3 xin1 ren2

sentences.english: The site claimed it was not responsible for the content of materials that users posted on its site.
sentences.chinese: 它聲明對用戶在其網站張貼的內容概不負責。

sentences.english: Can Investors Hang Their Hats on Tech?
sentences.chinese: 科技類股公司能不負投資者期望嗎？

sentences.english: Pretty soon you won't have the burden of making eye contact at the grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 很快地你將不負有舉證責任死死地盯着雜貨店。

sentences.english: Four like back to the liu risk, questioned why giant irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 四喜冒險回到劉家，質問擎天爲什麼做事不負責任。

sentences.english: Park Hyatt Beijing does not accept any responsibility for cars parking on the non-designated area.
sentences.chinese: 北京柏悅酒店對於任意停車而造成的後果概不負責。

sentences.english: The US Government's refusal reflects its irresponsibility towards the global environment.
sentences.chinese: 美國政府的這一做法是對全球環境不負責任的表現。

sentences.english: Trendstime holds no responsibility for any errors prior to publication.
sentences.chinese: 在截稿日期之前若有錯誤，本刊概不負責。

sentences.english: And even threating something like that is the height of irresponsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能賴賬，就連以此作爲威脅都是不負責任之尤。

sentences.english: Management dismissed the union's behavior as irresponsible and unreasonable.
sentences.chinese: 管理層把工會行爲視作不負責任和無理要求草草處理。

sentences.english: Some states exclude a duty of care by the driver of a motor vehicle –toward passengers whom he transports gratuitously .
sentences.chinese: 汽車司機對於他免費搭載的乘客不負照看責任。

sentences.english: Xiao sword flat business, not fifteen years.
sentences.chinese: 一劍一簫平生意，不負狂名十五年。

sentences.english: The talk of tax rises is also irresponsible.
sentences.chinese: 對增加稅收的談論也是不負責任的。

sentences.english: For accidents which happen to our workers outside the factory, we are not responsible.
sentences.chinese: 對工人在工廠外發生的事故我們概不負責。

definition: to fail to live up (to expectations)/unworthy (of trust)/to let down/to betray (hopes)/to disappoint
to have a clear conscience/to feel no qualms
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
